message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value to you at $15000. I understand its significance and would like to extend this exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, we are willing to consider a deal at a price of $12000. This represents a significant savings for you while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of working together.
